title: E8 Markets 20% OFF
description: E8 Markets, established in November 2021 and based in the United States, is a prominent prop trading firm offering a range of account types including E8 Account (2 Phase), E8 Track (3 Phase), and E8 One (1 Phase). The firm supports MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5, and it
forbidden_strategies: Max Position Size: 50 lots per order for FX and indices
20 lots per order for XAUUSD
Independent Evaluation: Each trading evaluation must be completed independently.
Server Request Limitation: There is a limit of 100 orders you can enter at a time
2000 modifications of TP/SL and orders per day. The maximum position limit per day is also 2000.

Risk Management: Risking your entire daily drawdown on a single trade is not permitted. Engaging in prohibited trading practices will result in termination from our program and a refund of the fee paid from the account where this rule was broken.
Hedging: Hedging across multiple accounts
even those belonging to the same trader
is strictly prohibited.
Trade Duration: You cannot hold more than 50% of your trades for under one minute.
Risk Exposure Limitation: E8 reserves the right to de-risk trading strategies by limiting risk exposure to no more than 1% per trade idea or time horizon if prohibited practices are detected.
E8 Trader Stage Account Exceeds Profit Threshold: If your accounts profits surpass the Dynamic Drawdown value
you can request a payout of all profits earned. However
you should leave a drawdown buffer in the account to continue trading. If you withdraw all your profits
it will result in the closure of the account.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: Signature program: Minimum payout amounts: Rise \u2013 $312.50, Plane \u2013 $62.50. E8 One: Minimum payout amounts: Rise \u2013 $250, Plane \u2013 $50.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed: You can copy trades from or to your personal account, another account, or even between multiple E8 Trader accounts, or between E8 Trader account and evaluation account (As long as these are your own trades from your own account). Restriction: You cannot copy trades (or use the same trading ideas) between multiple E8 evaluation accounts. Each evaluation must be done independently.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed: You can also use any EA (Expert Advisor) as long as we don't see multiple users executing the same trades/strategy. We limit one strategy per user, so if we see multiple users utilize the same EA, it may lead to the termination of your account. So even though the use of third-party EA is allowed, we recommend that each user use their own programmed EA.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: After 60 days of inactivity, the account is disabled and there is no entitlement to a refund.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed in evaluation stages and E8 Signature Funded stage, Not allowed in E8 One Funded stage 5 minutes before or after high-impact news.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Overnight and weekend trading is not allowed (in Signature Program).
forbidden_strategies: Max Position Size: 50 lots per order for FX and indices
20 lots per order for XAUUSD
Independent Evaluation: Each trading evaluation must be completed independently.
Server Request Limitation: There is a limit of 100 orders you can enter at a time
2000 modifications of TP/SL and orders per day. The maximum position limit per day is also 2000.

Risk Management: Risking your entire daily drawdown on a single trade is not permitted. Engaging in prohibited trading practices will result in termination from our program and a refund of the fee paid from the account where this rule was broken.
Hedging: Hedging across multiple accounts
even those belonging to the same trader
is strictly prohibited.
Trade Duration: You cannot hold more than 50% of your trades for under one minute.
Risk Exposure Limitation: E8 reserves the right to de-risk trading strategies by limiting risk exposure to no more than 1% per trade idea or time horizon if prohibited practices are detected.
E8 Trader Stage Account Exceeds Profit Threshold: If your accounts profits surpass the Dynamic Drawdown value
you can request a payout of all profits earned. However
you should leave a drawdown buffer in the account to continue trading. If you withdraw all your profits
it will result in the closure of the account.
firm_rules.ip_vpn_policy: Standard procedures; Maintain account integrity and individual trading.
